una shakaye jathyanthara dinayata samagamiwa, padukka, arukwaththa sadaharitha una arane sanwidhanayen, una shakaya pilibandawa danuwathbhawaya wadi diyunu kirima, una shakaya sanrakshanaya kirima, waga aarambhaya ha bhawithayata ganime prawanathawaya athikirime wishesha wadasatahanak pawathwini.mehidi una pandam dalwima, una wedi harambaa, una paru padima, batanala wadanaya, una sekku hadima, una pittu thambima, una iniman thanima, bata thuwakku prahara, diya thuwakku prahara, ha una ankura, sup dansala athulu wisheshanga rasak kriyathmaka wiya.shri lanka una bata aashi්ratha sanskruthika ha parisarika urumayan raka ganime aramunin pawathi mema wadasatahana sandaha padukka pradeshiya lekam es. ech. hewage, jathika mosthara madhyasthana niladhari dabliw.
